Posts.Content: Apr 11, 2013 03:41AM ldianel wrote: Sorry to hear of your cancer progression.  I, too, learned my cancer has progressed, (in many areas now) just a few weeks ago.  I'm on a new round of treatment.  I just have to accept it, take the treatment, and keep a positive attitude about it. And, if this chemo fails, I'll go on to the next.  So, plant your pumpkins and when they're ripe for picking, paint a happy face on one!
Posts.Title: Back to Chemo....Stupid mets are agressing again soleil505 ldianel
